thread.title: BRIEF-Alior Bank Not To Pay Dividends In 2018, 2019 - Deputy CEO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alior Bank Not To Pay Dividends In 2018, 2019 - Deputy CEO
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - ALIOR BANK SA:
* ALIORâ€™S CAPITAL BASE WILL GROW BECAUSE THE BANK WILL NOT PAY DIVIDENDS IN 2018 AND 2019, DEPUTY CEO FILIP GORCZYCA SAYS AT A PRESS CONFERENCE
* EARLIER CO POSTED FY NET PROFIT AT 515.2 MLN ZLOTYS, CLOSE TO ANALYST EXPECTATIONS
* SHARES DOWN ALMOST 6 PCT AT 0955 GMT Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
